website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive binoculars that offer outstanding magnifications for such a low price, plus they are packed with features and come with ample accessories.
pros: Comes with a host of accessories including pouch, cleaning cloth, and lens caps
cons: Eyepiece knob is known to be wobbly, but tightening it helps
Some owners gripe about inaccurate calibration

customer_reviews.title: Not usable - misaligned lenses
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars absolutely did not work at all. The lenses must have been misaligned because they were unusable - that being said, there was not trouble returning, but I was not willing to reorder and chance that we would receive another broken pair. Will order a better known brand for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran J McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Eyepiece knobs fell off SECOND USE
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take on a safari. Second time I use them they broke. Specifically one of the Eyepiece knobs fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Alcaraz

customer_reviews.title: Okay IF you've never had okay binoculars before...
customer_reviews.text: I can't really complain much about these as I only paid 20$ for these, actually 17$ with a coupon. They do work, everything has a blueish tint to it when viewing from them. The focus is a little... iffy?... maybe not the correct term there. I got these to view the wildlife in my backyard. I have a deer feeder set up on a timer and I just sit and watch all the critters while dinking my evening coffee. Long story short, these work. Not top notch, not even close but they do the job I need them to do. If you are any type of serious hunter, bird watcher or anything watcher I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky X TV

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied!  No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent binoculars, sturdy build, good optical quality (no "rainbow" around objects, almost no vignetting), amazing reach (I can see details of houses and even individual trees 5 miles across the Chesapeake Bay)! A great bargain for such a fine product. Good to have the carrying case. Other have commented on weight, which I find very acceptable, and on a par with my older binoculars with half the magnification. Am I satisfied? Absolutely! Negatives? None!
customer_reviews.author: Bill F 20657

customer_reviews.title: Much better then I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say how excited I am about these binoculars. I was skeptical at first when I ordered but now I would highly recommend for the price they are great. I love them. They are super clear to look thru and I can see farther and better then I expected. Easy to adjust. Super nice bag that they came in. I am easily able to spy on my neighbors too. Lol. Yep I will admit it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and eyesight
customer_reviews.text: Agree with others. They are very low quality. Low clarity and cheap optics. I am ALSO unable or limited to focus on an object, a very small portion of the viewing area is clear. The rest is blurry and make you feel dizzy and cross eyed. I started getting a headache after 10 minutes of use. I am unable to bend back the rubber view pieces to use with glasses. Unfortunately my return window has passed so I will be giving these to some kid to play with and looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: ANIBAL RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Blurry
customer_reviews.text: Very low quality. Low clarity. Just cheap optics. If you are able to focus on an object, a very small portion of the viewing area is clear. The rest is blurry and make you feel dizzy and cross eyed. Don't be fooled by all of the positive reviews, seller offers free stuff for positive reviews!
customer_reviews.author: vin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much from a $30 pair of binoculars, just wanted something basic for checking out the NYC skyline from my apartment window in NJ. They are actually much better than I expected; easy to focus and everything looks sharp with a wide field of view. They are built sturdy and have a nice weight to it. Not too heavy but don't feel like cheap light-weight plastic either. Would definitely recommend these especially if it's your first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Martins

customer_reviews.title: Comes with great instructions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been confused about how to effectively use binoculars and these come with great instructions. The lens caps won’t get lose because they are tethered to the binoculars. Great feature.
customer_reviews.author: to23ot

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 8 year old son. I was impressed with the quality for the price. They have a nice carrying case and clear picture. I like the caps for the lenses are attached to the necklace strap to he can’t lose them. We looked at large big box sports stores and a similar set was over $100
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable quality, especially for the price. I use mine to watch birds in my backyard. I bought my grandson a pair, too. Great buy, well made. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good features, performance, and quality at a super price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these binoculars for a trip to Alaska after doing a lot of research. Their construction is solid, the grip is comfortable, the focus is easy, the 50mm gives a bright image, they use a good prism, and they include a case and a wide strap that can also holds the end cap. We are not sure that they qualify as compact compared to other models, but their larger size makes them easier to hold steady when using maximum magnification on a distant object. For anyone looking for a really good pair of full-size binoculars at an amazing price, we recommend that you try these.
customer_reviews.author: David Kline

customer_reviews.title: Watch birds like a pro
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars can see true color, even though they magnify really well. I really like them because the covers for the lenses are fastened to the string and binoculars, so you don’t have to put them in the case every time. They come with a case, a cloth, and a string. They were a bit heavier than I was expecting, but otherwise I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These were great for birding. We were clearly able to see so many birds at distances our other binoculars can’t do clearly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Good price for good product
customer_reviews.text: I am planning a trip to a safari in Africa. I thought this is a must product to have. Honestly I picked this one randomly (as I do many time with products I’m not familiar with). I got this product a couple of weeks ago, and I’ve been testing it consistently, it works great, easy focus, not heavy, and also provides good vision at night.
customer_reviews.author: SagiAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice 12 x 50 Binoculars. It's not by any chance a professional piece of equipment, but rather a recreational one and the binoculars are pretty decent for this price range. It's easy to operate out of the box, and they do exactly what they described to do. It comes with a strap and and a bag, so that you can easily carry them around.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are legit. I totally expected them to be lower quality because of the affordability but they are extremely well made and high quality. The only downside is that they are on the bigger/heavier side. I bought them for my son’s hiking bag, not realizing the size. He is only 6 so they will have to be carried in mine. However, they are a great pair for the whole family to use if you’re lookin for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Satya.mama

customer_reviews.title: Not very good. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I got them for going to concerts. Totally useless. The St Augustine Amptheater is a small venue it is not Madison Sq Garden. Found these not to be helpful at all. And they are heavy. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lg212

customer_reviews.title: Adequate Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great Binoculars. Our friend said we got a good deal and they were good for the money. Bought these to watch an Air Show from their deck. Love that these have protective caps for both ends and nice case and they way they are shipped is Insane. I am storing mine in the original box. Can’t wait to go somewhere to use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Wander

customer_reviews.title: It does what is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This binocular is excellent for outdoor use., it zooms perfectly and the image doesn't get blurry. Size is perfect, so it's easy to carry, I use it when I'm on a horse ride to see animals and plants that are far away. The description on Amazon is right on point, so you don't feel robbed because it actually does what is supposed to do. I trully recommend this product for anyone who likes outdoor activities. It is a MUST for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: NORVEY

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Left and right images are not aligned. Otherwise the build quality is better than what I expected for a 20 dollar pair of binoculars. Also lots of offgassing when new.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Night rocket launch
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars work well. We watched a rocket launch at night on the beach a several miles away. You could see it clearly! If you're looking for a decent pair that won't break your wallet, give these a try.
customer_reviews.author: KBDunham

customer_reviews.title: Huge binoculars that disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be awkward because they are HUGE. They didn't do well in low light situations and were less than impressive for focusing. There are much better binoculars out there for slightly more money. Spend the money
customer_reviews.author: farmer83

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bird Watching
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for the price. We have a small backyard (our land is a mere 0.16 acre) with a bird feeder in the back corner. I want to be able to see them up close, but since birds are extremely messy, we like to keep the feeder in the back corner by the fence. These work great and are exactly what I needed to use them for. Great buy! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ligon Clark

customer_reviews.title: Well aligned and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly aligned and easily adjusted, these are a pleasure to use! They are big and solid and heavy. The rubber armour feels good. The turn-down eyecups do not turn down but they work fine. I have bought two pairs and they are getting a little more expensive, but are a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: paul james pegg

customer_reviews.title: Gift for birdwatcher, she loves them.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are amazing! Mine came pretty darn close to focus. We use them for looking out the back yard at the feeders 10 yrd away, and have also used them to see things clearly about 150 yards away on the back of he property.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grohl

customer_reviews.title: Double Vision on two pairs
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first pair thinking they were internally damaged in route to my house, even though the binoculars were very well-insulated inside the box. I opened the second pair to find the same issue of double vision. They seem like a very nice pair of binoculars, and I wonder if these were just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family stole these
customer_reviews.text: We bought these and loved them for a week before boyfriend's family decided to borrow them forever. They are picky people so I guess that means they work well. I'm about to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Delashmit

customer_reviews.title: Very good for wildlife viewing.
customer_reviews.text: Very handy binoculars. They take the place of a smaller pair stolen from my car. The BFULL binoculars are naturally heavier but give excellent long distance wildlife viewing. Their per-eye adjustability is excellenta
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Everhart

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i love the product itself, and the shipping time (something important to me) was FAST. The product also included warranty card and info as well as a card for a FREE gift and discount for USA.. really cool. love it ,
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Had hoped they'd be decent after reading reviews, but, showed up with the collimation messed up and would only produce blurred, double-images. Hopefully will have better luck with my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: thomas fox

customer_reviews.title: Wasted our money
customer_reviews.text: Neither my husband nor I were able to get these in focus. We had ordered these while on vacation, because we had forgotten to pack our wonderful Fujinon Meibos -- admittedly this model is moderately priced, but these were virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: The wright it fine,, and the range is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't had a pair of binoculars in years, so I have nothing to use for comparison....but these are exactly right for what I want.. I now Iive in an apartment on a lake with swans, and many other birds and that's my goal.. To watch them nest building, protecting there territory, etc. would be impossible without getting closer to the situation. These glasses make the scene very impressive. The wright it fine,, and the range is perfect. Ruth Hancock
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: ... past I had ordered something similar and was very disappointed because the product turned out to not what was ...
customer_reviews.text: In the past I had ordered something similar and was very disappointed because the product turned out to not what was claimed. I am very happy with this product. It is light and the lenses are powerful. It comes with covers for all lenses and well as carry on case..
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Full rfund. And never out if box. Returned nextday?upset!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to return Upset i had to pay shipping" plus onl portion of amount i paid back what a rip off Product good but too great for a 6. Yr old! Upset i didnt get full refundg
customer_reviews.author: Jane Mathes

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are an incredible value. They feel very sturdy and well built. They are easy to focus and provide a sharp, clear image. I assume the expensive, top of the line binoculars are better in some ways, but these are more than just toys. For the prize they are a wonderful product. I used them in Seattle, and the magnification is powerful enough I am able to see individual people walking inside the Space Needle from over 2 miles away!
customer_reviews.author: Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Very good binoculars for a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: The optics are great and the zoom/focus mechanisms are smooth. The case, straps and lens covers are adequate to protect a $21 investment :) I bet with a little care these binoculars will last for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this on my safari
customer_reviews.text: This binos are super easy to use and the quality on these is fairly clear compared to anything else i've used before. I've had some smaller tasco ones that don't compare to these as these seem to be a full sized bino that works really well. I wish I had these on my most recent safari trip so I could see wildlife and other things!
customer_reviews.author: Aristo

customer_reviews.title: Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Binoculars purchased for bird watching and game activity. Works well for the most part, could be sharper image.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: I'm Glad I Did!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned my own set of binoculars before, even though I have used them before. So, I used them for the first time today, and the magnification is substantial. The exterior surface is an easy-grip 'rubbery' plastic and they seemed very comfortable to use. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked it. If your hands shake a little
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. If your hands shake a little, it won't matter, because these still allow you to see clearly whatever you want to look at. I bought this as a gift for my father in law. The clarity is amazing. Great binoculars. They (bfull) are also sending me a gift for buying these binoculars. They gave me four options to choose among as a gift, and I went for chid binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Iman

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter pair
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids to use to watch ships at the lake. They work pretty well, and I appreciate that it came with lens covers and a case to keep dust and dirt off the lenses.
customer_reviews.author: JC in Ytown

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: While not made of highest quality materials (lots of plastic), they function perfectly, great vision with these. At this price, practically disposal. Easy focus, wide field of view. Just what I needed to to spot and track a local family of hawks training their offspring in-flight maneuvers and to hunt.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is so poor that it causes uneven focus. They never worked well. They broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my ten year old. When we go to watch the Air Force Thunderbirds fly over. I never have binoculars because he is always taking them. These are perfect for him. They are very durable and good quality and they fit his hands well. I love how the lenses covers on the bottom are one piece and attached to the binoculars too. (the top are one piece as well) thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Fig

customer_reviews.title: Really good viewing at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these binoculars for wildlife watching as our other binos were 7, 8 and 10 power. The 12 power Bfulls give us added detail to see animals and birds up close. They are bright and sharp and although heavier than the less powerful glasses, they are not too heavy and they come with a good neckstrap and case in addition to lens covers.
customer_reviews.author: jim gillingham

customer_reviews.title: These worked very well on safari. The sizes does ...
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well on safari. The sizes does make them heavy, but the ability to have greater magnification makes it worth it. I would have given them a five, but the eye cups should be longer/deeper for greater comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a low price
customer_reviews.text: High quality for such a low price. Packed very securely and all accessories were included.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: We found them hard to focus and difficult to view through. We have two other pair we use for sightseeing and these I have realized have reached the back of the cupboard and never get used. Keep looking there has to be something better out there. It wasn't just me, no one in the family likes to use them. Last choice.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Image isn’t very clear when you look through them. But for a first timer like myself they work
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set
customer_reviews.text: Great first pair of binoculars for my 9 year old. He is able to get used to adjusting focus and finding the same thing I look at with mine. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: High quality binoculars and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this binoculars like a Christmas present for my son. The quality is really good, I like the keeping case was attached-amazing idea for traveling!!! Shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: margarita poznyak

customer_reviews.title: Great binocs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great binocs for the price. Very wide view and clarity is fantastic. Thinking of buying another one, but noticed the price went up 10 bucks overnight. But definitely contends with the high dollar models.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of binoculars for our summer adventures, something big & little kids could easily use & these are exactly that. They come with covers for all the lenses & a great carrying/protective case. Will defiantly buy a little kids versions from Bfull too!
customer_reviews.author: lovnAmzn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all the fire apparatus sets with these for Haz-Mat, Search and Rescue, and Fire Ground operations with these. They work great and with a reasonable price we could get all the trucks covered at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I buy it as a gift for my dad. He was so happy & excited using it. Good wrapping, strong materials, easy to use. Recommended 👍
customer_reviews.author: Milly

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised how good these binoculars are for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how good these binoculars are for the price. I took a chance and we are so happy with the purchase. Thought if nothing else would give to the grandkids but I'm keeping them for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a nice pair of binoculars with a minimum rating of 12×50 for a while now. These are excellent quality and feel very robust. I took a peek out my window and saw two people on a smoke break from an incredible distance. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ethen Wimberley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old nephew and he loved it. Very easy to use and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ebell432

customer_reviews.title: If you are on the fence about these, get them!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I had hoped. Very clear. Comfortable enough strap to but but a great strap. The clarity of the optics was a surprise given the price. I'm getting a second and possibly a 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Taz969

customer_reviews.title: These came in very good condition. I like the lens covers
customer_reviews.text: These came in very good condition. I like the lens covers. The case is nothing to write home about but it's there. The view is very clear. They have a good weight to them, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Code

customer_reviews.title: OVERPRICED
customer_reviews.text: Binoculars are average quality. Better deals elsewhere. To top it off, they stuck a free gift coupon in the box that when inquired upon, they would not honor.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Langton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after less than 3 months of minimal use for watching deer on our property and kept in climate control office and storage bag. The lenses show double of everything and the strap fell apart in less than a month. Very disappointed in this product and would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Strack

customer_reviews.title: Hand for star gazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Crisp images. Light weight. Great add for our astronomy nights.
customer_reviews.author: Don Farage

customer_reviews.title: Best resaonably priced binoculars I have
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy watching the birds in my area and these are the best of any binoculars that I have for this purpose. I like them so well I am going to gift them to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Barbra Mcclung

customer_reviews.title: They love these binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself, but my kids have taken it over. They love these binoculars. My husband takes the kids to football games, now sitting in the nosebleed section isn't too bad. Kids also love looking up at the stars.
customer_reviews.author: ninel

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to focus and fit comfortably around my neck
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars come with a protective carrying case. They are easy to focus and fit comfortably around my neck. I bought them to use on family trips for sightseeing.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Really good binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Great image but a bit bulky. The bag is quite cheap but the product itself seems very good and definitely projects a wonderful image.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: these were disappointing. should have sent them back. ...
customer_reviews.text: these were disappointing. should have sent them back. basically, will not focus all the way. I think it is a simple adjustment when manufactured, but not a task for the end-consumer.
customer_reviews.author: John Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I have used the binoculars for a week now and they have worked very well. They are easy to adjust and the quality is great for the price. I am glad I trusted the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cat I am

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a field trip my son and I went on. Not only were they great but he was the cool kid with the cool binoculars and all of his friends wanted a turn. It was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with these binoculars, much better and clearer than the set I had. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She has been watching birds and wildlife with awe with them. So glad I found them. Good price for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great item to have while kayaking
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these come with covers and case. I only used binoculars once as a kid and I remember it being much more difficult. Must have for the kayak
customer_reviews.author: MR AND MRS SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I dropped these binoculars while they were in the case (not a far fall either) now the lenses do not coincide at the correct focus. I've had these for only a month and I can't return. 30bucks down drain..
customer_reviews.author: Nate Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and functionality of binoculars you’ll find for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing binoculars! Better some of of the higher end ones I’ve purchased in the past! Highly recommend these if your looking for binoculars but on a budget. Traveled well in a suitcase as well, multiple flights and no damage at all!
customer_reviews.author: QuikSilvr

customer_reviews.title: Would be better for an older child - 12 and above
customer_reviews.text: Heavy for a young child to carry and walk through the woods. Would be better for an older child - 12 and above.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Prime delivery is NOT deliver to front door, they only set it on the inside of the gate.
customer_reviews.text: The product is GREAT, it is just the delivery that I dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent visibility and great price. We purchased for our son instead of a telescope for viewing the night sky. Well made molded case is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jake lee

customer_reviews.title: This are good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This are good for the price, although they are heavy (at least for me). Other than that, they're good for birding around while hiking.
customer_reviews.author: marylinna

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of binoculars. Optics are good and nice feel when using them. Great price for this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Marshall T. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great when I got them but developed double vision within 3 months. For the price, I decided just to buy another pair and they did the same thing. They are great binoculars if they could continue to work more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: William D Chew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. Clear view. Light weight. I am going to have trouble giving them to my Grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes cheaper is better
customer_reviews.text: I work on the water and need a dependable pair of Binoculars. These work awesome. Very light, easily adjustable and for not being a name brand, I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Uniewski

customer_reviews.title: These binoculars are perfect. It comes with a nice bag to store ...
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are perfect. It comes with a nice bag to store the binoculars in and it comes with a strap so the binoculars can hang around your neck (hands free). The binoculars are great quality and have amazing visibility. I definitely would recommend these binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Clear wide view
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an upcoming cruise to Alaska. They are easy to focus and have the perfect range, clear, and wide view.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Images from both eyes did not converge. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Images from both eyes did not converge. I was seeing 2 images when looking at an object. Compared with a pair of Bushnell's that worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rimlinger

customer_reviews.title: These binoculars work good for bird watching
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars work good for bird watching. Quick and easy adjustments give you a clear veiw. Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Compact and can see a great distance away
customer_reviews.text: Compact and can see a great distance away, looking forward to taking them to a future stadium concert and travels
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: They work well but I was disappointed in the weight and size
customer_reviews.text: They work well but I was disappointed in the weight and size. I thought they would be lighter and smaller

customer_reviews.title: ... brother in laws b-day gift and he was extremely happy, now he can look at the stars with ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my brother in laws b-day gift and he was extremely happy, now he can look at the stars with something else. You can see super clear.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are what we wanted at a very affordable price.

customer_reviews.title: value!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect them to be as heavy as they are, and a little bigger than what I think the photo looked like compared to the others. I was expecting them to be smaller. I don't use them very often so they will be ok for the price.

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I received my Binoculars, I love them, easy to use, strong. Customer Service was great answered my email right away. I would purchase again. Mary Downs

customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong focus easy and good view for the avid viewer.

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived and they are not worth it. They can only focus out at one distance point and it isn't terribly clear. Go with a name brand and save your self the time and hassle of shipping these back.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction and good optics. Great quality for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Backyard bird watching! yay!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bird watching (in my own backyard!)..and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: L. Winder

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done
customer_reviews.text: Wanting something to take whale watching and these worked perfectly. Came with a carrying case and neck strap. Easy to use and worked great on the water. Would recommend for anyone who is not wanting to spend a lot of money and feel like they got a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton

product_meta.title: BFULL Binoculars 12x50 Binoculars for Adult Teenagers Compact Binoculars Wide Angle Weak Light Night Vision Waterproof Binoculars with Bag and Strap for Bird Watching, Hunting, Safari, Sports
feature_bullets: Superior Grade Binoculars-Robust high-quality workmanship for harsh environments. Provides crisp, 12x magnification images. Specially designed for outdoor activities such as bird watching, traveling, hiking, driving, hunting, concert, sports and more.

Crisp and bright-The 16.5 BAK-4 Prism and 50mm fully multi-coated lenses guarantee the high-quality optics system. Make you see things brighter, sharper and zoom in details which could easily be overlooked. Weak light night vision. Can be used at night, but not in complete darkness.

Wide Field of Vision - 1000 m field of vision, whether in the desert or in the mountains. The filled nitrogen serves as anti-fog protection and enables a sharp view in every situation. The binoculars can be used with a tripod, convenient for long time use. With the strap and travel bag, It is easy to carry and storage. Great gift for dad, friends, teenager, and sport lovers.

Easy to focus-Multi-coated aspherical lenses are great for stable light transmission and minimize distortion, It can provide a bright high contrast better image. Integrated diopter can correct and adapt to personal vision needs, including for eyeglasses wearers.

DURABLE AND WATERPROOF. Do not worry about rain and wet, the BFULL binoculars are waterproof! The robust frame and rubber-reinforced housing provide solid protection for the toughest weather conditions. The shock-absorbing housing absorbs vibrations while providing a secure grip for maximum protection.
